name: Canadian Tire VR Tree Decorator NFT Collection

metadata.name: Established Past 100 CT
metadata.description: This NFT (non-fungible token) is one of the exclusive 100 NFTs crafted in celebration of Canadian Tireâ€™s 100th Anniversary in Toronto in 2022 by Adam Jarvis (Vectorvault), who is recognized by Canada Council for the Arts as a Canadian Digital Visual Artist... This is an animated Christmas crystal glass ornament in front of an image of a historical Canadian Tire store with a Boston University Red (#CC0306 / RGB (204, 3, 6)) colour overlay, with the following features: the CT100 logo highlighted in the centre of the ornament, a hexagonal light emanating from the centre behind the logo, light particles swirling within the ornament, a stream of light flowing underneath, the CTC establishment date, 1922, with an arrow to the left of it, and the current year, 2022. Underneath the ornament is a label and a Gold (#FFD700 / RGB (255, 215, 0)) plaque numbered CT002.

attributes.value: Image of a historical Canadian Tire store with a Boston University Red overlay
Hexagonal light emanating from centre behind logo
CTC establishment date, 1922, with an arrow to the left, and current year, 2022
Cursive Established label and gold plaque number CT002
